QuestData.Title: Trouble at the Overwatch
QuestData.Description: Yesterday, I sent two of my best scouts to spy on the ogres at Mar'gok's Overwatch.$B$BI haven't heard back from them.$B$B$n, would you do me the honor of checking on them? I'm sure it's nothing; the Overwatch is a large fortification.$B$BI'd feel better knowing they're okay.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm honored you're here to help, wolf-$g brother:sister;. Things here are worse than we thought.
